displayBio.en: Shi Xinning (born 1969, Liaoning Province) graduated from Luxun Academy of Fine Arts in 1990. His paintings, influenced by social realism and European styles, draw on iconic photographs of figures such as Mao Zedong to reflect on the uncanny reality of the twentieth century. Shi lives and works in Beijing.
displayBio.zh-hant: 石心寧 (1969年生於遼寧，現工作及生活於北京)，1990年魯迅美術學院師範系畢業。受社會現實主義和歐洲風格影響，石心寧從標誌性的社會和政治照片中抽取圖像——如毛澤東——重新演繹，並創作繪畫作品以呈現20世紀不可思議的現實。
